member.name: T:VRDR.BaseMessage
member.summary: Class BaseMessage is the base class of all messages.

member.name: F:VRDR.BaseMessage.MessageBundle
member.summary: Bundle that contains the message.

member.name: F:VRDR.BaseMessage.Record
member.summary: A Parameters entry that contains business identifiers for all messages plus additional information for Coding messages.

member.name: F:VRDR.BaseMessage.Header
member.summary: MessageHeader that contains the message header.

member.name: M:VRDR.BaseMessage.#ctor(Hl7.Fhir.Model.Bundle,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Construct a BaseMessage from a FHIR Bundle. This constructor will also validate that the Bundle represents a FHIR message of the correct type.
member.param: a FHIR Bundle that will be used to initialize the BaseMessage
if true, then missing bundle entries will not result in an exception
if true, then an incorrect bundle type will not result in an exception

member.name: M:VRDR.BaseMessage.findEntry``1(Hl7.Fhir.Model.ResourceType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find the first Entry within the message Bundle that contains a Resource of the specified type and return that resource.
member.param: the type of FHIR resource to look for
if true, then missing entries will not result in an exception
member.typeparam: the class of the FHIR resource to return, must match with specified type:

member.name: P:VRDR.CauseOfDeathCodingResponseMessage.CauseOfDeathEntityAxis
member.summary: Entity axis cause of death coding grouped by line. An alternate flat list of entity axis codes is available via the CauseOfDeathEntityAxisList property,

member.name: P:VRDR.CauseOfDeathCodingResponseMessage.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisList
member.summary: Entity axis cause of death coding as a flat list. Provided as an alternative to the CauseOfDeathEntityAxis property which groups cause codes by line, .
member.para: Each entry in the list is a tuple with three values:

list.item: Position: Sequence of code within the line

member.name: T:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry
member.summary: Class for structuring a cause of death entity axis entry

member.name: F:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.LineNumber
member.summary: Identifies the line number (values "1" to "6") of the corresponding cause of death entered on the death certificate. The following list shows the corresponding line in the death certificate for each value.

member.name: F:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry.AssignedCodes
member.summary: The codes assigned for one of the cause of death entries in the death certificate.

member.summary: Create a CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry with the specified line identifier

member.summary: Create a CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry with the specified line identifier and corresponding codes
member.param: list of codes

member.name: T:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisBuilder
member.summary: Helper class for building a List<CauseOfDeathEntityAxis> from a flat file. Groups codes into one CauseOfDeathEntityAxisEntry per line and sorts codes by position.

member.name: M:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Construct a new empty instance.

member.name: M:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisBuilder.ToCauseOfDeathEntityAxis
member.summary: Build a List<CauseOfDeathEntityAxis> from the currently contained set of codes.
member.returns: cause of death entity axis coding list

member.name: M:VRDR.CauseOfDeathEntityAxisBuilder.Add(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Add a code to the list of codes that will be used to build a List<CauseOfDeathEntityAxis>. Order of code addition is not significant, codes will be ordered by line and position by the ToCauseOfDeathEntityAxis method.
member.param: Sequence within line
ICD code
member.exception: Thrown if line or position is not a number
